results.title: Basic ecology: Lakes - aging and pollution
results.brief_description: Explains the aging process of lakes. Examines the typical plant, fish and animal life found in various lake habitats. Investigates the changing water quality and the succession of organisms throughout the aging process. Emphasises the human impact in speeding this process.
results.description: Explains the aging process of lakes. Examines the typical plant, fish and animal life found in various lake habitats. Investigates the changing water quality and the succession of organisms throughout the aging process. Emphasises the human impact in speeding this process.

results.brief_description: Shows the utility of computers in the performance of routine administrative and business tasks. Outlines the steps in the computer process along with names of parts, terms usages.

results.title: Basic chemistry: family of halogens
results.brief_description: Shows the similarity and graduation of properties of the halogens and explains both the similarities and differences in degree on the basis of atomic structure. Looks at the properties of other families of elements in the Periodic Table. Suitable for upper secondary level.

results.title: Bashful ballerina
results.brief_description: Imogene Coca is delightful as Miss Klutz, a pupil in the dance troupe of a Russian artiste named Kobelev. Miss Klutz is so clumsy - no matter how hard she tries to be a good dancer, her performances are always a disaster When a rival calls upon Kobelev to lend her ballet troupe a dancer, Miss Klutz gets the job…and the laughs that go with it. Cast also includes Eugene Sigaloff, Irene Moore, George Lessey, Alexander Asro, Alyce Chappelle, Buddy Page.

results.title: Based on Deception
results.creator_credit: British Information Services and Brian R. Everett
results.brief_description: An account of a British surveying expedition working at Deception Base in Antarctica. Shows the departure from London of the thirty-three people involved in the team, their arrival, life and work at Deception.

results.title: Base line measurements
results.brief_description: Illustrates the principles which lie behind the design and manufacture of survey equipment. This film explains in detail the method measuring a “Base Line” as a first stage in land survey by triangulation method. Emphasises the corrections which have to be made when using base line equipment to allow for errors due to gravity, direction and height above sea level. No other credits available.

results.title: Bartleby
results.creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films and Larry Yust
results.brief_description: An adaptation of Herman Melville’s story about Bartleby, the scrivener, who answers an advertisement for work with a lawyer and after a brief spurt of intense work, gradually breaks down, refuses to move and eventually dies because he has lost the will to live. A detailed discussion and analysis of the story follows. Features a cameo appearance of the actor who played Greg Brady in the popular television series ‘The Brady Bunch’ as a law clerk.

results.title: Bars of silver
results.creator_credit: Editorial Film Productions and Unilever Films
results.brief_description: Every day at fishing ports along the coast of Britain, fishermen land their catch. Twenty-four hours later the fish is available for sale in shops all over the country. This film illustrates all aspects of this industry - the trawlers and drifters; busy quaysides and fish auctions, the freezing, filleting, washing and boxing; trains criss-crossing through the night; centuries old Billingsgate fish market.

results.title: Barriers
results.brief_description: A group of young people discuss the problems a particular person has in relating in American Society. Unrehearsed, the film talks about such topics as racial conflicts, suspicion, gangs and the social/economic classes. No other credits available.
